ygData.subject: RE: making hotkeys
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, you can switch between the hotkey panels number 1 through 6 (I think the is a total of 6) by pressing the shift + corresponding hotkey panel number.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, you can switch between the hotkey panels number 1 through 6 (I think
the is a total of 6) by pressing the shift + corresponding hotkey panel
number. I experimented a bit with this last night and was unable to make
the hot key thing work to my satisfaction... I guess it takes a lot of
practice and some time to get use to it. So if you plan on using this sort
of tactic, do as that message said and practice. A LOT.

Daks

-----Original Message-----
From: Trent Carroll [mailto:trent@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 8:14 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] making hotkeys

From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>

verify that I understood this correctly:

I can switch between the 6 sets of hotkeys by pressing SHIFT + the number of
the set I want?

Kindrael

For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
